DOC.brief_title: Functional Microarray Augmentation Skin Treatment With Lidocaine
DOC.detailed_description: The study 's primary goal determine whether co-application functional microarray needle ( FMA ) speed rate topical anesthesia provide lidocaine gel 4 % ( LG4 ) . A secondary goal determine whether depth anesthesia enhance .
DOC.criteria: age least 18 year , must provide voluntary consent , weight least 50 kg , allergy lidocaine , skin disease , inflammation , infection venipuncture sit tested major dermatologic disease history , know liver abnormality , woman currently breastfeed
